column1: Switchgrass used to generate conversion residue was treated by ammonia fiber expansion and enzymatically treated with Cellic CTec3 and Cellic HTec3 ( Novozymes) to digest cellulose and hemicellulose ( to produce glucose and xylose, primarily) ( 38).
GJK is a Chinese experimental herb formula [ 23], and ZQFTN is a monomer drug derived from the Chinese traditional herb - Caulis Sinomenii [ 24].
